predicate.note: Frames file for 'store' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry keep 15.2, no other framed members. Comparison with 'stock'.

example.name: cutting-edge technology
example.text: Although it is not the first company to produce the thinner drives, which *trace* store information in personal computers, MiniScribe says it is the first with an 80-megabyte drive; the company plans to introduce a 120-megabyte drive next year.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: Operationally, Maxtor benefited from robust sales of products that *trace* store data for high-end personal computers and computer workstations.
example.arg: high-end personal computers and computer workstations
